text: The Voyah Dream is a Luxury Minivan made by Voyah the luxury brand of Dongfeng since 2021. == History and Features == The Voyah Dream was first shown at the Guangzhou Auto Show in 2021. showing a prototype of a large luxurious minivan and was launched in March 2022. it has a 2+2+3 seating setup and uses the Electric Smart Secure Architecture plataform used in other Voyah's cars. It has both Plug-in hybrid and electric versions the Plug-in hybrid version combines a 1.5 liter turbo petrol engine with a electric motor while the electric version has a electric motor with 160 kW (210 hp) a 82 or 108.7 kWh battery with a range of 520 km (323 mi) it was improved in August 2024. == Markets == The Voyah Dream was first launched in The Chinese Market and is also sold in European countries like Norway Italy Denmark Finland Russia Portugal and Spain and is also sold in Israel. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Minivans
title: Voyah Dream
